abstracts.cdata!:
This aide memoire Greater Managua Water
            Supply and Sanitation Project (PRASMA)of ENACAL Nicaragua
            summarizes the main discussions and recommendations of the
            mission. This aide memoire will be publicly disclosed upon
            completion of the mission. The project continues to run from
            the last mission (September 20, 13), with significant
            progress in the three activities of the critical path of the
            Project: (i) sewerage works in Ciudad Sandino (Bello
            Amanecer), (ii) works in the PTAP of Sandino City, and (iii)
            potable water in macro-sectoral. The mission congratulated
            ENACAL for progress in the works. In parallel, the mission
            pointed out that besides the works there are activities
            essential for successfully closing the project, such as
            building the foundation work for intra household sewer
            connections, and collection in the 27 districts.
